author: RAIHEN
comment: I know daraz is a very good place to shop by online. But suddenly I ordered a hot wheels from daraz.I got a massage from daraz which told me they are giving my hot wheels In 8 hours. But it is almost 24 hours but my hot wheels isn't arrived. I call the man who was delivering my parcel told me he couldn't gave my parcel that day. His name was RAJU DELIVER. He told me he may give my parcel today . But where is it . This makes me very dissatisfied from daraz.

reply.author: Daraz Mobile
reply.content: Hi Raihen! We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Please drop an email to support.app@daraz.com with your order number, country and concern; we will investigate your complaint asap.

author: khazra Saqib
comment: Pathetic... I received my parsel today that is awful .. i ordered for the eyeshadow plate of 160 colours and they delevired me the 20 colours plate of very very very cheap and low quality and charged the full price. I have orderd some more things and want to cancel the order but can not do.... there is no such options. I request you to consider my cimplaint and take action.

reply.author: Daraz Mobile
reply.content: Hi Khazra! We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Please drop an email to support.app@daraz.com with your order number, country and concern; we will investigate your complaint asap.

author: shafwan2010
comment: I purchased a trimmer online and it was very dissapointing to find out that the trimmer was damaged. This was for a friend of mine and i had to face a big issue because i was unable to gift it on time. I lodged a complaint two weeks ago and is still waiting for the respond. The service was utterly useless and the money paid was not worth it. I would never recommend this site for anyone looking for quality products with good customer service.

reply.author: Daraz Mobile
reply.content: Hi Shafwan! We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Please drop an email to support.app@daraz.com with your order number, country and concern; we will investigate your complaint asap.

author: Santa Maria
comment: I love daraz. I've been shopping on daraz for years. The thing is, some of the makeup products on daraz are bit too pricey. I can actually go to a local store and find the same products in much cheaper price. I don't know why you guys are charging 100/200 bucks extra. But I still love you anyway ❤

reply.author: Daraz Mobile
reply.content: Thank you for your valuable contribution! We have forwarded your suggestion to our product team, and we thank you for rating your experience with us! :)

author: nayab j.khan
comment: The App crashes suddenly and frequently.  Very unreliable app. You are in the middle of placing an order and suddenly the app crashes.  Also, frequent error message of "problem fetching data" pops up in the app. Pictures also lead very slowly.  Earlier version of this app was much much better. I prefer using Daraz in Google Chrome.

author: Daniyal Akbar
comment: This is a very good app for online shopping. I am very fond of it. But about 3 months ago I ordered a card for PLAY STATION for 2500 rs. When I used it, I came to know that it is expired. I called the man who shipped it but he did not give a reasonable response. This isn't a good fact about the app

reply.author: Daraz Mobile
reply.content: Hi Daniyal! We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Please drop an email to support.app@daraz.com with your order number, country and concern; we will investigate your complaint asap.

author: Tahira Mohammad
comment: I love this app. Easy to use, ask for confirmation again n again... Product quility is superb. I have ordered many thing whenever i want anything n m busy i search thing and ordered in one click <3 buttt delivery is too late, plss make it fast.

author: RJ sOuRov
comment: Hey, Daraz is really helpful website ever but anyone can help me to solved my small problem. When I installed the Daraz apps in my phone they are saying problem fetching data. I am unable to fix this issue. please help me to solved this problem.

author: Syed Hassaan Mujtaba Bokhari
comment: Terms and conditions need to be mire user friendly. I had bought a wireless BT speaker but it was damaged. Returned it but did not get the replacement nor was I returned my money. I was just offered a coupon code for the same amount. My money was stuck and not a pleasant experience as I am a student and don't have a lot of money at the same time. Ruined my budget.

reply.author: Daraz Mobile
reply.content: Hi Hassaan! We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Please drop an email to support.app@daraz.com with your order number, country and concern; we will investigate your complaint asap.

author: THE DON'S FILM'S
comment: When i ordered something it says that my number is invailed but i give them all right information but they all time says it is invalied this is the worst online shopping app i ever seen     Updated:- ididnt putted +88 before my number. And their product quality is good enough. It has some small bugs pls fix that in next update

reply.author: Daraz Mobile
reply.content: Thank you for your valuable contribution! We have forwarded your suggestion to our product team, and we thank you for rating your experience with us! :)

author: Mohamed Mujahith
comment: Best online purchase application but still need some improvements because some time when we order the product that shows stock is available. But after order is cancelled because of stock unavailable. And another issue that I saw some products images are not relevant and that is not reflect actual product.  Anyway way thanx daraz

reply.author: Daraz Mobile
reply.content: Thank you for a 5-star review! We thank you for being such an amazing customer, and hope to serve you just as well in the future!

author: Pak TECH
comment: I am using daraz app since one year and i almost buy 8 products but the fact that when we look for an item to buy its country manufactured is not shown. I request to daraz that please put there 2 options in daraz.pk app in which country made is shown. For example made in china or malaysia. Thats why most people are worried about wrong manufacturing country and not buy from daraz.pk like my friends. Please do this suggestion or give me proper response about it.

reply.author: Daraz Mobile
reply.content: Hi Daniyal, thanks for sharing your concern with us. We would request you to drop an email at support.app@daraz.com with your country and concern and our relevant team will get back to you with a resolution soon. Thanks.

author: Asanga Mendis
comment: How do we complain about broken, duplicate or fake item. seems to be Daraz donot take any responsibility about those events. So i recommend  ebay is the best they have a system of customer issues to rais. Therefore it is very dangerous to buy items from Daraz.

author: Md Rashadul Islam
comment: From Daraz I ordered some products.  They have too many issues. Can't deliver every item in 1 period of time. Delivery rate is slow.  Response rate is poor. Then one item they gave me something else instead of something I ordered for.

reply.author: Daraz Mobile
reply.content: Hi Rashadul,  our apologies for the inconvenience caused. Please drop an email to support.app@daraz.com with your order number, country and concern; we will investigate your complaint asap.

title: Cheated

author: Meesha N
comment: It does not let me see full titles if tge name of product is lengthy. Its such a pain trying to find foundation shades Nd other details. Kindly fix this, otherwise good app, I've been using it since it came out, a loyal customer of daraz

reply.author: Daraz Mobile
reply.content: Thank you for your valuable contribution! We have forwarded your suggestion to our product team, and we thank you for rating your experience with us! :)

author: Areeb Shaikh
comment: Search engines used in this app is a joke.. search result its showing me is no where near what i was looking for... Searching for a product is complicated first of all to set filters nd all nd yet still no accurate results..

reply.author: Daraz Mobile
reply.content: Hi Areeb. We're sorry you've had to face this problem. Our support team is investigating your complaint and will try to fix the issue as soon as possible. Thanks!

author: Mohiuddin Sabbir
comment: I'm never subscribe for any mail notification in the first place.  But still I get to many email. its annoying. When I trying to stop it the app always said, there is some problem. "Do not disturb" is not working.   Fix it.

reply.author: Daraz Mobile
reply.content: Hi Mohiuddin! We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Please drop an email to support.app@daraz.com with your country and concern; we will investigate your complaint asap.

comment: I know that daraz is very good.. but i have a problem with it that last time i ordered 10 to 12 products from daraz but they didn't send me all the products together... they sent me two or three products some times one product at a time... i am very disappointed because of that..

reply.author: Daraz Mobile
reply.content: Hi there! We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please drop an email to support.app@daraz.com with your order number, country and concern so our support staff can assist you with your concern.

author: Toriqul Islam
comment: Very bad app does not have any offer. They rise the price of the item and then reduce few money and surprisingly its what they call offer

reply.author: Daraz Mobile
reply.content: Hi Toriqul! We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Please drop an email to support.app@daraz.com with your country and concern; we will investigate your complaint asap.

comment: I like 'daraz.pk' app. It's a time saving app for me. Containing quality products. Shipping process is also good. Only problem I face that some mobile accessories I ordered were not delivered same (like glass protector & cases).

reply.author: Daraz Mobile
reply.content: Thanks for your valuable feedback. We're very sorry you had to face such an issue. Please drop an email to support.app@daraz.com with your order number, country and concern; we will investigate your complaint asap.

author: The over Arena
comment: I got my parcel today. I thought it would be nice but daraz sended a cheap quality.  I want it to this parcel nd my money back.  Its not easy to earn money.  Nd customer care ia offline too.   I hope daraz will fix this thing on my next shopping.

reply.author: Daraz Mobile
reply.content: Hi there! We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Please drop an email to support.app@daraz.com with your order number, country and concern; we will investigate your complaint asap.

comment: I order 2 products which are third class product so I will warn you people's. Please  do not download this app these all the thing are 3rd class

reply.author: Daraz Mobile
reply.content: Hi there! We apologize if you faced issues with our service. Please drop an email to support.app@daraz.com with your order number, country and concern; we will investigate your complaint asap.

author: ishi liyandara
comment: I ordered a in ear  BLACK headset but the rubber of the ear knob was white. But the picture showed a full black one. The sound quality is very very bad. Very disappointed.
i have ordered 7 days before yet I have not received my order... and no number is provided so that v can ask about our order.... very bad customer service u people have

reply.author: Daraz Mobile
reply.content: Hi there! We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please drop an email to support.app@daraz.com with your order number, country and concern; we will look into the matter for you.

author: Hamid Jalal
comment: Undoubtedly the largest variety of all sorts of products in Pakistan. Shipping cost seems like a nuisance though which makes many product prices uncompetitive

author: Aryan Kamal
comment: Well it's not bad. I just think the customer service could use some work. I got a call and was trying to ask if I could have it deliver in a days time and they just cut the call as soon as they were done talking and even while on call they kept talking over me. And I think 1 day shipping would do wonders for your business.
Please nobody install this app. This app sucks. I ordered from Habigonj, they sent my order to Barishal. It's very far away. I didn't put any field wrong. DO NOT INSTALL IT.

author: Pam K
comment: I have placed an order from November and it's January 21st now and still my issue is not solved. Very very upset. Never had issues with other online shops. I thought this was supposed to be a good place to shop. Please get back to me ASAP.

author: Zehra Khushhal
comment: Each Category for shopping should be provided with sub-category so I can directly choose my interest shopping items. After choosing one category I am not able to go in further sub-category, like in kids i am unable to see only clothes or toys,  its coming all together which time consuming. Make it user friendly

author: khalil haseeb
comment: some days ago i ordered a hot belt size of xxxl but daraz sent me hot belt in large size..  so i would not give 3, 4 or 5 stars.... its useless in my openion......

author: Md. Zubaer Ahammed
comment: Poor service, poor business strategy. I made a few orders and every order came separately which is very irritating and inconvenient. I requested to store all my orders as they arrive and ship to me altogether. Also, the Treadmill was delivered to me not set. I had to set it up myself. They delivery guys don't understand written addresses and calls over and over.

author: Navod Anushan
comment: They haven't not good service.  One day I bought the item this item is damaged. So i told them definitely i need to refund my product. So they told me okay sir I'm coming definitely. I waiting for 1 month. But they're not give me the solution. Lot of time i send the message and email.  So now I'm not recommend that website.

author: Lqr
comment: This review is from Nepal. The customer care here is a total waste. I purchased a wrist watch 2 months ago but it was a damaged piece. I immediately reported about it but wasnt followed up. Few days later I was informed a representative will contact soon but that was that and I never heard from that phone number. I went to their office and they say its not their jurisdiction to exchange and the courier company will take care of it within 3 days. I waited another month and again went to their office. Then I was given the address to the courier company and was refunded. Total time wasted=2 and a half months. Also they never pick up their mentioned customer care phone number. I seriously recommend to buy only cheap and use and throw type of products from this site. But I am rating 2 star because we can always compare the price with market rate.

reply.author: Daraz Mobile
reply.content: Hi Lqr! We sincerely apologize to hear about the issues you had to face with our service. Please drop an email to support.app@daraz.com with your order number, country and concern and we will make sure you are provided with the best possible solution. Thanks.

author: Jahanger Khan
comment: I shop many time from daraz but the quality of products are not good. So i suggest them to please send good quality products. Other wise no one would like to buy any thing from daraz ...

author: A.M.Q Drag Racer
comment: All of the things we buy 4rm here r just fake I have ordered a fix it pro scratch remover but it was fake n that pen was just filled with phynyl which is commonly used in cleaning of houses My money is simply wasted many times

author: Sagor S. Costa
comment: Well, the app is okay. It's slow even in the good wifi zone. And the problem is they do not promise to parcel all the goods together! They mentioned that items may be delivered separately. They should have something for this.

author: Irfan sujoy
comment: It always says invalid phone number when i try to fill up the telephone section! Please help! I gave it my valid number but it says invalid number! I cant order my desired items! Please respond

author: Nusrat Ahmed Diza
comment: Even after cancelling a order while the verifying message arrived, the app still shows the canceled order and still I am getting calls to recieve the order. It is really annoying.

reply.author: Daraz Mobile
reply.content: Hi Nusrat! We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Please drop an email to support.app@daraz.com with your order number, country and concern; we will investigate your complaint asap.

author: Sana Shahzad
comment: u people are just fraud.... worst experience ever u deserve negative rating... i recommend not to buy even a single thing frm ths app.... soooo pooor survice

reply.author: Daraz Mobile
reply.content: Hi Sana! We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Please drop an email to support.app@daraz.com with your order number, country and concern; we will investigate your complaint asap.

author: Sk Muin
comment: Not for all: I ordered a face scrub or something in late December for my sister from Sydney. I paid the amount using mastercard or credit card option I don't remember but I paid the amount. I am writing this review now as my sister living in Barisal, Bangladesh is yet to get the item I sent her using Daraj. I could not find a place on the app to place a complaint or money back form. I would not recommend this Daraj thing to anyone living abroad to send their loved ones gift items in BD. Very dissapointed!!

reply.author: Daraz Mobile
reply.content: Hi Sk Muin! We are very sorry to hear about the mishap with your order. Please drop an email to support.app@daraz.com with your order number, country and concern; we will investigate your complaint asap.
